text:
FUNDING
UPDATES
Below please find a summary of updates for the Flex NonQM and DSCR Matrices and Acquisition Guidelines. These updates must be implemented for all applications and locks as of December 3, 2025. Version 1 of the update includes the changes highlighted below.
GUIDELINES AND MATRICES - Updated as follows:
· DSCR Supreme - Updated as follows:
• Investor DSCR- Updated as follows:
o The maximum number of financed properties is now capped at 20, including those held in an LLC
o First Time Homebuyer is permitted
· Foreign National - Updated as follows:
o The foreign tradeline requirements have been removed for Foreign Nationals with non-US credit.
o When the primary wage earner has three scores, the minimum tradeline requirements are waived.
o Housing history for the borrower's primary residence in a foreign country is not required to be documented.
o Updated the LTVs on Full and Alt Doc investment properties for borrowers with No Credit Score to line up with the LTVs offered for DSCR borrowers with No Credit Score.
• Flex Debt to Asset Qualifier - Updated as follows:
o The foreign tradeline requirements have been removed for Foreign Nationals with non-US credit.
o Housing history for the borrower's primary residence in a foreign country is not required to be documented.
o Updated the Income and Asset Age of Documentation requirement to 120 days to align with the other Loan Programs.
• Flex Select Closed End 2nd - Updated as follows:
o Updated the Income and Asset Age of Documentation requirement to 120 days to align with the other Loan Programs.
. First Time Investor Restrictions - Added requirements that exist for DSCR Mixed &
Multi loans to the guidelines which were already present in the matrices. No guideline change has occurred with this update.
